name: Don't stop shooting!
description:
Your gun has broken and you can't stop shooting!
If you do stop shooting, the gun will explode.

Use the blast of the gun to find bullets. But look out for the bombs and bats!

Controlls:

Point your mouse to change the direction of your gun.
Use your left mouse button to shoot faster.

R -  Restart
M - mute music
F11 - Fullscreen
